contentBlocks.title: General Requirements
items: A building must be verified to achieve energy efficiency
The energy efficiency of a building must be verified by compliance with the energy efficiency verification requirements of this Section
The energy efficiency verification requirements of this Section must be satisfied by either:
Compliance with the Deemed-to-Satisfy Provisions of this Section, or
Compliance with a Performance Solution that demonstrates that the energy efficiency verification requirements of this Section are satisfied

contentBlocks.title: Verification Methods
items: Energy efficiency must be verified by one or more of the following methods:
Energy efficiency verification by calculation
Energy efficiency verification by measurement
Energy efficiency verification by simulation
Energy efficiency verification by testing
Energy efficiency verification by inspection
Energy efficiency verification by commissioning
Energy efficiency verification by monitoring
Energy efficiency verification by reporting
Energy efficiency verification by certification

contentBlocks.title: Exemptions
items: A building that is not required to comply with the energy efficiency verification requirements of this Section
A building that is required to comply with the energy efficiency verification requirements of this Section but is not required to be air-conditioned
A building that is required to comply with the energy efficiency verification requirements of this Section and is required to be air-conditioned but is not required to be mechanically ventilated

A building that is required to comply with the energy efficiency verification requirements of this Section, is required to be air-conditioned and is required to be mechanically ventilated but is not required to have an outdoor air economy cycle

A building that is required to comply with the energy efficiency verification requirements of this Section, is required to be air-conditioned, is required to be mechanically ventilated and is required to have an outdoor air economy cycle but is not required to have a building management system
